home.title: Messenger Links Generator
home.paragraph1:
If you're looking for an option to create a link using which customers will be able to message you directly on WhatsApp, Viber, Telegram, etc.,
you're in the right place.
home.description: We will generate a link for any messenger of your choice.

landing.title: Create a contact page with direct links to messenger chats
landing.description: We'll generate you a contact page with links to all your messenger accounts - for free! Perfect for Instagram and other social networks.
landing.check_messengers: Select the messengers that you use
landing.greetings: Enter the text you want to be displayed before the buttons
landing.here_is_your_link: Here is your contact page link
landing.done: Get a link to your contact page

whatsapp.title: WhatsApp Link Generator
whatsapp.description: You can create a simple WhatsApp link and add it to your Instagram profile or generate HTML code for your website.
whatsapp.help: Make sure that number is no having + sign before the country code
whatsapp.label: Enter your WhatsApp phone number (only digits)
whatsapp.result: Here is your link for WhatsApp, copy it and use where you want

vk.title: VK Link Generator
vk.description: You can create a simple Vk.com link or generate HTML code for your website.
vk.help: Don't enter your email! Go to My Profile on vk.com: the text in the URL after vk.com/ is your user name
vk.label: Enter your VK.com user name
vk.result: Here is your link for VK, copy it and use where you want

linkedin.title: LinkedIn Link Generator
linkedin.description: You can create a simple LinkedIn link or generate HTML code for your website.
linkedin.help: Don't enter your email! Go to your profile on linkedin.com, and copy the text in the URL after linkedin.com/in/.
linkedin.label: Enter your LinkedIn user id
linkedin.result: Here is your link for LinkedIn, copy it and use where you want

viber.help: Make sure that number is no having + sign before the country code
viber.label: Enter your Viber phone number (only digits)
viber.result: Here is your link for Viber, copy it and use where you want

wechat.title: WeChat Link Generator with QR Code
wechat.description: You can create a simple WeChat link or generate HTML code for your website, email, social networks, etcâ€¦ to make it easy for your customers to reach you
wechat.help: To create a WeChat link, you need to obtain the link from the QR code. Open WeChat, go to the ME section at the bottom. At the top, click on your profile picture, then click on My QR code. Open the options in the top right corner and save your QR code. Now, you just need to read it from your phone or use https://scanqr.org/, then copy your personal URL and paste it in the field below.
wechat.label: Enter your WeChat Link from QR Code
wechat.result: Here is your link for WeChat, copy it and use where you want

universal.title: {messenger} Link Generator
universal.description: 111 You can create a simple {messenger} link or generate HTML code for your website.

universal.result: Here is your link for {messenger}, copy it and use where you want
